title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.20 - Berth usage; securing watercraft
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.20 - Berth usage; securing watercraft

State Regulations

All persons are prohibited from making fast any rope or
mooring to any mooring facilities, except to the mooring bollards, posts or
bits provided for that purpose. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1242.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
